overview:
Sergio is the CEO and co-founder of Launchcard, Inc. Originally from Nueva Imperial, Chile. Sergio early fascination for videogames, social networks and communication.

Entrepreneur, Bachelor of Arts, Audiovisual Communicator and Commercial Engineer. Sergio is a high-energy Professional with great creativity and skills, business development, brainstorming, marketing, online business, customer service, lobby, team building, project management, Strategic Planning and Negotiations. I admire and puts much Attention on the “soft power” about the People Who surround him.

Have a positive attitude and great Organizational and personal skills in a multicultural and multidiscipline environment. Winner of innovation and entrepreneurship event Chilean sub35, 2010.
